comments: F.Lasch in Linnaea 5(3): 431-462 (1830) is probably an error for Wilhelm Gottlob Lasch.
source: CMI, from R.E.G. Pichi Sermolli 1 March 1991. Correspondence by email with S.Dressler and G.Wagenitz dated 24 Jan. 2005. Grummann, Biogr.-Bibliogr. Handb. Lichenologie (1974), where it is established that middle name is Gottlob rather than Gottfried according to baptism records.
